mapper.select: SELECT *,posts.id pid,focususers.id fid,focususers.`name` fname,focususers.userId fuserId,collectors.id cid,collectors.`name` cname,collectors.userId cuserId from users LEFT JOIN posts on posts.userId = users.id LEFT JOIN focususers on focususers.userId = users.id LEFT JOIN collectors on collectors.userId = users.id where users.id = #{id}
